original_text: “On the day of the firstfruits, when you offer a grain offering of new grain to the Lord at your Feast of Weeks, you shall have a holy convocation. You shall not do any ordinary work,
korean_text: 칠칠절 처음 익은 열매를 드리는 날에 너희가 여호와께 새 소제를 드릴 때에도 성회로 모일 것이요 아무 일도 하지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: On the day of the firstfruits,
when you offer a grain offering of new grain
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 새 곡식의 소제물을 드릴 때

sentences.original_text: to the Lord at your Feast of Weeks,
you shall have a holy convocation.
You shall not do any ordinary work,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어떤 사무적인 일도 하지 못할지니라.
